```{python}
# | label: fig-polar
# | fig-cap: "Image caption here."

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt                           # <1>

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)                                 # <2>
theta = 2 * np.pi * r                                     # <3>
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={"projection": "polar"})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
